DOC.brief_summary: To determine the risk of surgical site infection after surgical skin incision, comparing electrocautery vs. scalpel.
DOC.brief_title: Electrocautery Versus Scalpel for Surgical Skin Incisions in Cesarean Section.
DOC.criteria: Elective Cesarean section, regardless of gestational age. Skin infection in the cesarean section area. Emergency cesarean section. Presence of a maternal pathology that increases the risk of infection (immunocompromised state).
